name: Ronin Redemption 2: The Last Stand
description:
In Ronin Redemption 2, you control a Ronin who has just recently lost his lord in a battle between two warring clans. While you are visiting the grave site for your lord, you are ambushed by the same clan that's responsible for killing your master and their only target is you. You must use your skills to fight off your enemies but there is just one problem... They just keep on coming. How long will you last in the all out battle against all the odds. Your kill count will be posted to a leaderboard once you die.

HOW TO PLAY:

USE MOUSE TO MOVE AROUND

If Katana is out, Press Left Click to Strike

If Range Weapon is out, Press Left Click to stand still. Press Right Click to Shoot

Press P to Pause

Press TAB to switch Weapons Once it's Unlocked

Press Space to Dash Once it's Unlocked

If you find any bugs or have constructive feedback about the game, feel free to let me know in comments. Thanks for playing!

Update 1.1

  • Added Almanac for enemies
  • Remove Life system so it wouldn't conflict with Health System
  • Archers and Grand Archers drop arrows on the ground. 20% chance of it happening
  • Added Dash Counter
  • Faster Camera
